newsitem.title: New Zealand: New Zealand shares close stronger in subdued trade.
newsitem.headline: New Zealand shares close stronger in subdued trade.

text.p: * New Zealand shares end firmly on light turnover
* Lion Nathan spikes up, Telecom gains
286 +4 * NZSE-10 cap index +10.40 at 1,200.50 379 +11 * Volume NZ$39 million. Futures +13 at 1,209
